attributes.action: Call a General Election to give us the opportunity to Vote you and your Over Taxing Circus out.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Add your name to this petition if you are sick to the back teeth of this sham of a government with its non-elected Prime Minister taxing us to the point of desperation to pay for its ill conceived and wrong policies.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
